title: SCP-6664 4
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:blankstyle acs=a]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//Changes from the original document are highlighted in ##blue|blue##.//

[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source

    |item-number= SCP-6664

    |clearance= 1

    |container-class= safe

    |secondary-class= none

    |disruption-class= vlam

    |risk-class= warning

    ]]

-----

[[include component:image-block name=treeV.png|align=center|width=100%|caption=SCP-6664 prior to containment.]]

-----

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-6664 is to be contained in a greenhouse at ##blue|Site-43##. SCP-6664 is not to be climbed, for fear of damaging its branches.

**Description:** SCP-6664 is a tree of the species //##blue|Pinus banksiana##//, more commonly known as the ##blue|jack pine##, currently located at ##blue|Site-43##. SCP-6664 is identical to other trees of its species, save for its anomalous effects.

SCP-6664's anomalous effects activate whenever ##blue|one of its cones is touched## by ##blue|fire##. When ##blue|fire makes contact with a cone from## SCP-6664, instead of ##blue|opening and dropping its seeds## as expected, ##blue|the cone will violently detonate, releasing a number of seeds not physically able to fit inside the cone at high speeds. Cones produced by SCP-6664 have## been designated SCP-6664-1.

SCP-6664-1 ##blue|are the cones produced by SCP-6664##. SCP-6664-1 ##blue|contain seeds that grow anomalously fast, growing to full size in approximately 4 days. Trees produced from SCP-6664 are otherwise non-anomalous.##

-----

[[=]]
+ **Addendum 6664.01: Discovery**
[[/=]]

SCP-6664 was discovered on January 28, 2014, after ##blue|Isabelle Diana##, a ##blue|local teenager##, reported ##blue|lighting sparklers near SCP-6664, and being hit with several seeds at high speed. A nearby off-duty Foundation agent saw the detonation of## SCP-6664-1 and reported it as a possible anomaly. SCP-6664 was subsequently moved to ##blue|Site-43##.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
//**This file has been locked.**//

//No more edits are being allowed on this page until you all can agree on something. I don't care what SCP-6664 is, just leave the damn file alone. Report back to me when you finally [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6664/offset/5| talk it out]]].//

//-Technical Researcher Rosen//

[[/div]]
author: Rhineriver
